scripts.release:ios:alpha: sh scripts/env_manager.sh alpha && bundle exec fastlane ios beta --env default
scripts.release:android:alpha: sh scripts/env_manager.sh alpha && bundle exec fastlane android beta --env default
scripts.release:ios:beta: sh scripts/env_manager.sh prod && bundle exec fastlane ios beta
scripts.release:android:beta: sh scripts/env_manager.sh prod && bundle exec fastlane android beta
scripts.release:ios:prod: sh scripts/env_manager.sh prod && bundle exec fastlane ios prod
scripts.release:android:prod: sh scripts/env_manager.sh prod && bundle exec fastlane android prod
scripts.android:dev: sh scripts/env_manager.sh dev && ENVFILE=./environments/dev/.env.dev react-native run-android
scripts.android:alpha: sh scripts/env_manager.sh alpha && ENVFILE=./environments/alpha/.env.alpha react-native run-android
scripts.android:prod: sh scripts/env_manager.sh prod && ENVFILE=./environments/prod/.env.prod react-native run-android
scripts.ios:dev: sh scripts/env_manager.sh dev && ENVFILE=./environments/dev/.env.dev react-native run-ios --scheme shayr-dev --simulator="iPhone X"
scripts.ios:alpha: sh scripts/env_manager.sh alpha && ENVFILE=./environments/alpha/.env.alpha react-native run-ios --scheme shayr-alpha --simulator="iPhone X"
scripts.ios:prod: sh scripts/env_manager.sh prod && ENVFILE=./environments/prod/.env.prod react-native run-ios --scheme shayr-prod --simulator="iPhone X"
scripts.ios:staging: sh scripts/env_manager.sh staging && ENVFILE=./environments/staging/.env.staging react-native run-ios --scheme shayr-prod --simulator="iPhone X"
scripts.reset_node_modules: rm -rf node_modules/ && npm cache verify && npm install
